purpose: Initializes the program by accepting current date values and opening input files INFILE1 and INFILE2, setting status flags accordingly.
Reads a record from INFILE1 and moves it to PENDING-AUTH-SUMMARY if successful, otherwise sets END-ROOT-SEG-FILE flag on end-of-file.
Reads a record from INFILE2, populates child segment data and key for IMS insertion if valid, or sets end-of-file flag.
Closes both INFILE1 and INFILE2 and displays error messages if either file fails to close.
Terminates the program abnormally by setting RETURN-CODE to 16 after displaying an abend message.
Abends the program with return code 16 when an input file fails to open.
Inserts a root segment into the IMS database using data read from INFILE1.
Abends the program if the root segment insert operation fails with an unexpected status code.
Inserts a child segment into the IMS database after qualifying the parent root segment using the root key.
Performs an IMS insert call to add a child segment to the database after successfully retrieving the parent segment.
Abends the program with return code 16 when the GU call to the root segment fails.
Abends the program with return code 16 when the ISRT call for the child segment fails.
